players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Bob seems suspicious to me, I don't know why but he does."
Diana: "Bob, I investigated you last night and found that you're the mafioso. You can't fool us this time."
You: "I am the mafioso, and I killed Alice last night. You should be careful as I might target Charlie next."
Charlie: "Bob is lying, I think Diana was the mafioso and killed Alice."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
